content.question: Which of the following events in Britain was Priestley praising in the passage?

choices.label: The removal of James II by parliament and Dutch intervention in 1688
The split with the Roman Catholic Church to create the Church of England
The execution of Charles I by parliament during the English Civil War
The Acts of Union between England and Scotland creating the United Kingdom in 1707

content.answer: The removal of James II by parliament and Dutch intervention in 1688

topic.text: 3.2: English Civil War and the Glorious Revolution

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
